about_the_game:
Neko Ghost, Jump! is a 2D/3D Puzzle-Platformer where perspective shifting is the key to victory! Take control of Nekoman as he runs, jumps and fights his way through various environments to find his friends and loved ones that have been taken away by the Ghost Pirate Dog Boss and his minions.

Each level has a leaderboard that players can try their best to outdo others. Feeling greedy? Take your sweet time collecting as many coins as possible and unlock new customization options! Want to take it easy? Casual Mode is for you, no stress on time, just take a leisurely walk around and enjoy the sites.
detailed_description:
#demo

Boom


About the Demo

Neko Ghost, Jump! is a 2D/3D Puzzle-Platformer where perspective shifting is the key to victory! Take control of Nekoman as he runs, jumps and fights his way through various environments to find his friends and loved ones that have been taken away by the Ghost Pirate Dog Boss and his minions. Each level has a leaderboard that players can try their best to outdo others. Feeling greedy? Take your sweet time collecting as many coins as possible and unlock new customization options! Want to take it easy? Casual Mode is for you, no stress on time, just take a leisurely walk around and enjoy the sites.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400 / AMD 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / AMD RX 570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel i5-9600K / Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD RX 5600 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Neko Ghost, Jump! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor 2.5Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor 3.5Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This demo only has one of the seven biomes that will ship with the final game. Five levels total. You can play in Casual Mode or try to beat everyone on the leaderboards!
